overview: Hidden Valley has managed to retain its Old Western atmosphere, free of modern-day corruption, until escaped convict Smitty arrives with plans of taking over and opening the town up as a gambling resort. It's up to Rex Allen and his pals to put a stop to it and sing a few songs along the way.
tagline: HE'S A FIGHTING FOOL...WHEN OUTLAWS TERRORIZE THE RANGE
title: Thunder in God's Country
